wikipedia_page.main: Caroline Linda Margaret Waldegrave (née Burrows), Baroness Waldegrave of North Hill, OBE (born 14 August 1952) is managing director of Leiths School of Food and Wine, which she jointly bought with former British Telecom Chairman and Chairman of the Royal Shakespeare Company, Sir Christopher Bland, in 1994.
